#labels Maze
=The *Turn* Block=

To access the *Turn* block, click *Maze*.

|| *Option* || *Description* ||
||turn *right* ||Turns Pegman to face right but doesn't move him any squares in the new direction.||
||turn *left* ||Turns Pegman to face left but doesn't move him any squares in the new direction.||

*Tip*: To move Pegman in the new direction, use the [http://code.google.com/p/google-blockly/wiki/Move Move] block.
